Package org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.env.internal

Class QualifiedObjectNameFormatterStandardImpl

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.env.internal.QualifiedObjectNameFormatterStandardImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
QualifiedObjectNameFormatter
public class QualifiedObjectNameFormatterStandardImpl extends Object implements QualifiedObjectNameFormatter
Standard implementation of QualifiedObjectNameFormatter which uses information reported by DatabaseMetaData to render qualified names.
